description: Main source file for a Flutter-based Tic Tac Toe game app, defining the root widget, game page, and UI logic.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget for the Tic Tac Toe app setting theme and home page.

classes.name: GamePage
classes.description: Stateful widget managing the game UI and state.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, initializes the Flutter app.

methods.name: _GamePageState.build
methods.description: Builds the main game UI including board and controls.

methods.name: _handleTap
methods.description: Handles user taps on the game board cells, updates game state.

methods.name: _checkWinner
methods.description: Determines if a player has won the game and identifies the winning pattern.

methods.name: _isDraw
methods.description: Checks if the game has ended in a draw.

methods.name: _resetGame
methods.description: Resets the game state to start a new game.

methods.name: _statusText
methods.description: Provides the current game status message.

methods.name: _statusColor
methods.description: Provides the color associated with current game status.

methods.name: _legendDot
methods.description: Creates a UI element for the legend indicating symbol color.
